properties.description: Movies Data, Column extract and count no of movies for Year
Copy multiple tables in bulk with Lookup and For Each

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT table_name, table_schema
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
ORDER BY table_name ASC;

scriptLines: EmpSqlSCD2 derive(HashSql = sha2(256,  iifNull(emp_name, '') + iifNull(dept, ''))) ~> hastSql
empCsv derive(hashcsv = sha2(256,  iifNull(Name, '') + iifNull(Department, ''))) ~> Hashcsv

transformations.name: DCSourceHash
transformations.description: sha2(256,  iifNull(Title, '') + iifNull(FirstName, '') + iifNull(MiddleName, '') + iifNull(LastName, '') + iifNull(Suffix, '') + iifNull(CompanyName, '') + iifNull(SalesPerson, ''))

scriptLines: Customersource1 derive(Cust_Hash_Source = sha2(256,  iifNull(Title, '') + iifNull(FirstName, '') + iifNull(MiddleName, '') + iifNull(LastName, '') + iifNull(Suffix, '') + iifNull(CompanyName, '') + iifNull(SalesPerson, ''))) ~> DCSourceHash
